physicalDescription.extent: The file is arranged in chronological order from the front to the rear of the file.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 2-3; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains the following:an extract from a memorandum by the Adviser to the Government of Bahrain, Charles Dalrymple Belgrave, dated 8 April 1945, in which he proposes that British police in Bahrain be housed at the Fort Bungalow and enquires as to whether it would be possible to import equipment for their quarters from India;the reply from the Political Agent, Bahrain, Cornelius James Pelly, in which he requests a list of the equipment needed.Folio 4 is internal office notes.
